data.name: Wanted in Hell
data.detailed_description:
Wanted in Hell™


In the haunted world of science vs. supernatural, are you the hunter or the hunted?

Wanted in Hell™ is developed in Unreal Engine 4 and currently in pre-alpha testing. Join the Dev Tracker Discord for updates and more!

Features


3v1
A party of 3 Hunters with unique abilities seek every advantage to trap and kill the monster before it grows too powerful.
The Monster feeds on survivors to unlock an ever-more terrifying arsenal of abilities to kill the Hunters.

Changing Environment
The clash of gunpowder and creature can take place in swamp, desert, snow, canyon, or forest with randomized loot, buildings, and gameplay elements. Be prepared for every match to be just different enough to keep you on your toes.

Victorian Horror Setting
Command a creature of darkness including Vampires, Werewolves, and Ghosts. Wield shotguns, revolvers, and repeaters with limited ammo and no automatic fire. Carefully time your shots to outplay your enemies with simulated physics projectiles that can ricochet off metal and penetrate wood.

Character Customization
The hunt has attracted folk from all walks of life. Stand out from the rest by modifying your Hunter or Monster with in-depth customization.

data.short_description: In this multiplayer 3v1 Monster Hunting game, a party of 3 Hunters use unique skills to trap and kill the Monster before it grows too powerful with an ever-more terrifying arsenal of abilities. In the haunted world of science vs. supernatural, are you the hunter or the hunted?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Wanted in Hell™ is developed by Hitbox Interactive
